question: Which of these means opposite phase of particles?
option1: phase difference between the particle is an odd multiple of π
option2: if the path difference is an odd multiple of (λ / 2)
option3: if the time interval is an odd multiple of T/2
explanation: Opposite Phase means: phase difference between the particle is an odd multiple of π or if the path difference is an odd multiple of (λ / 2) or if the time interval is an odd multiple of T/2
